name: Radiology/Imaging
description: Inpatient Imaging Services Patients at their hospital have access to an array of diagnostic imaging services, including: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) Computed tomography (CT) Mammography Nuclear medicine Ultrasound X-ray Fluoroscopy DEXA/Bone Density Interventional radiology Outpatient Imaging Services The San Francisco Chinatown location provides the broadest range of routine and advanced diagnostic services, utilizing state-of-the-art equipment at Chinese Hospital. howToGetIt: Call 1-415-677-2328 or 1-415-677-2373. For the Daly City location call 1-650-761-3550. 386 Gellert Boulevard, Daly City, CA 94015 Mon – Sat: 8:30 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.
